DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, observational, cohort study to evaluate the reliability of preoperative work-up of patients submitted to surgery for pancreatic cystic neoplasms, in a tertiary referral center. A comparison between the preoperative diagnostic suspicion and the final pathologic report will be done.
DOC.brief_title: Reliability of the Preoperative Work-up in Patients Submitted to Surgery for Cystic Neoplasms of the Pancreas
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of pancreatic cystic neoplasms indication to surgery pregnancy, breastfeeding
